name: Portenta_H7_ISR_Servo
keywords: timing, device, control, isr-servo, servo, interrupt, isr, isr-based, mission-critical, accuracy, non-blocking, mbed, mbed-portenta, portenta-h7, portentah7, portenta-h7-m7, portenta-h7-m4, portentah7-m7, portentah7-m4, stm32h7, stm32, precise, hardware
description: This library enables you to use 1 Hardware Timer on an STM32H747XI-based Portenta_H7 board to control 16 or more servo motors.
